job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: <p>Software Engineer</p><p>100% Remote</p><p>6 month contract-to-hire</p><p>Fortune 500 Health Client</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Position Overview:&nbsp;&nbsp;</strong></p><p>Team member will work on a team of truly talented individuals and be responsible for design, build and testing (using automation scripts but not limited to unit/integration/performance testing) of Product Enrollment Suite. This team is responsible for 5 systems all having to do with product. You will be working with homegrown systems and client systems. The candidate will be responsible for building&nbsp;components of the&nbsp;Product Enrollment Suite with a range of cutting edge technologies that interface with various enterprise systems.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Key Technologies Needed:&nbsp;&nbsp;</strong></p><ul><li>Angular&nbsp;</li><li>Nodejs/Typescript</li><li>Python&nbsp;</li><li>Deployment/containerization tools (Kubernetes/docker/jenkins/etc.)&nbsp;</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Required Experience&nbsp;/ Qualifications:&nbsp;&nbsp;</strong></p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Solid Analytical skills</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Familiar with&nbsp;Micro-services Architecture and Rest patterns using leading industry recommended security frameworks</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience in Data Integration (batch, real-time) following Enterprise Integration Patterns</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Highly motivated, well-rounded, team player and self-starter that works best in a collaborative, dynamic, agile environment&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Desired Experience / Qualifications:&nbsp;&nbsp;</strong></p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience in Cloud and related technologies such as AWS, Google, Azure</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SAFe Agile experience, with any SAFe certifications a plus</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Knowledge of reporting/BI tools such as Cognos would be plus</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Quick learner of new technologies and adapt to changes</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Excellent communication skills&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p></p>
